TopicTitle: Soooo is This Patch Ever Coming Out?

Articles.Content:
I saw something in the sept 17 newsletter that it was a week off. Been a couple more than that...and it's already a month behind the normal schedule right? I just feel like it's been forever since a patch and I'm getting pretty bored...Devised some seriously complex missions and been to all corners of the solar system...

Have I missed an announcement post or something? What's the deal?

I don't know where you have seen in the Sept. 17 KSP weekly that the next update that it would be out in a week, but you are mistaken. Release dates are never never given out because really, it's impossible to know when it would be ready.

And no, the update isn't late. Usual update times were of about 3-4 months, they dropped down to 2-3 months for .20 and .21 but the devs decided to go back to the old development cycle, so we are back into 3-4 months periods between updates. Last update was end of July, so I wouldn't be expecting the update before end of October. It hasn't even entered experimentals yet, although from the weeklies, I believe they shouldn't be too far

So yeah, that said, no need to ask for release dates, no one knows them, not even the devs.

Thread closed.
